tool_description: The Piotrosky score is a discrete score between zero and nine that reflects nine criteria used to determine the strength of a firm's financial position. It is utilized to identify the best value stocks, with a score of nine indicating the strongest financial health and zero indicating the weakest.

api_list.name: GetFScore
api_list.description: Retrieves the Piotrosky F-Score for the specified stock ticker provided in the query parameters.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol for which the F-Score is requested.
